website_summaries.verdict: Choose this mattress if support is your top concern, and you tend to prefer a model that leans to the firm side. The addition of the spring technology is worth considering for customers who prefer a model that sleeps more like a traditional mattress with the bonus of memory foam support.
pros: Distances itself from other bed-in-a-box mattresses on our list for the hybrid construction that combines layers of memory foam with a layer of pocket springs for superior support and motionless sleep
Great for consumers who prefer a mattress with a firm - but not hard - feel
Top layer has a hole-punched design that's breathable and cooling
cons: Some reports of back pain after sleeping on it

customer_reviews.title: Review four months after purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 13 inch Bamboo, Gel mattress Nov, 2016. I wanted to wait a few months before reviewing it. This bed is great. It's not as good as the $6000.00 Tempur-pedic my ex got to keep, but it is a close 2nd. I have owned a lot of mattresses, (latex, number bed, memory foam, and a host of name brands) over my lifetime. I am very happy with this product. It has kept it's shape perfectly. It is very comfortable, and hasn't dipped, or drooped in the middle. For the price, it's the best mattress out there.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Holy Freaking Schnikes
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough good about this bed. I have rheumatoid arthritis and I'm always in pain, but on this bed I can sleep on my sorest parts and, not only does it not hurt, it actually makes it feel better! It gives my poor body the support it needs without any pressure points. I was terrified of switching to memory foam after researching for months, but I slept on it for the first time last night and I am completely hooked. I got up at 7:30 and feel like I slept until 11:00. Do not hesitate to buy this!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia S.

customer_reviews.title: Off Gassing
customer_reviews.text: If you are sensitive or allergic to the smell of chemicals, do not buy this mattress. It gave me a horrible headache for the first three days it was in my house... In my guest room where I don't even sleep. I've had it for a month now and it has still has a chemical smell in the room. Not ECO!!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Good mattress, but doesn't hold up over time.
customer_reviews.text: Solid mattress with easy set up and no odd smell upon opening. However, over time (purchased in 2015) mattress has started to sag and their are dents where my husband and I sleep. I would say we are normal height and weight, I'm around 160lbs, he's around 200lb. We tried to rotate the mattress every so often, but it can't be flipped (different firmness on the bottom), so it didn't do much good. Originally I slept very well on it but now wake up in the night and have aches in the morning. This is really disappointing given that the mattress is only 3 years old. I would not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: working&mothering

customer_reviews.title: Good mattress but smells like chemicals
customer_reviews.text: Update: mattress still smells SO strong of chemicals. Even my husband who has a horrible sense of smell is bothered by it. Very disappointed considering I bought this because it’s Greenguard Certified. Great mattress but I bought it because there are no flame retardants and less toxins than a normal mattress. I’m disappointed that it smells so strong of chemicals! We’re in SC and can’t even have the windows open to air it out
customer_reviews.author: Acuna

customer_reviews.title: Memory foam
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mattress 3 years ago. I am a pretty big guy 250lb and this mattress caused me some serious shoulder problems as a side sleeper. The mattress has dipped and its extremely hard. I have been out of work almost a year with rotater cuff issues as a carpenter.. Finally purchased a latex mattress and set it up yesterday. Woke up for the first time in as long as I can remember without shoulder pain... Moral of the story is big guys be careful with foam mattresses... get as much latex as u can afford..
customer_reviews.author: Anakin Skywalker

customer_reviews.title: Side sleepers BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was advertised as being good for side sleepers. It was not. It sinks & offered no support to the knee on the bottom so I would wake up & not be able to walk immediately b/c my knee had been bent sideways for hours. Paradoxically, it seemed to be stiff as a board in the shoulder area so my neck started hurting & I'd wake with headaches. It's also HOT. I thought bamboo would be cooler but no. I addressed these concerns with Brentwood but b/c you have to flip it every 2 mins the tag was gone & they wouldn't refund even partially. I should've just set that $500 on fire.
customer_reviews.author: Cupcake

customer_reviews.title: ... had a hard time finding a mattress that was comfortable. I'm a stomach sleeper and most mattresses either ...
customer_reviews.text: I've always had a hard time finding a mattress that was comfortable. I'm a stomach sleeper and most mattresses either feel like I'm sleeping on the floor or are too soft. A friend recommended Brentwood to me and​I'm glad they did. Bought the firm King size a few weeks ago. For a stomach sleeper this is by far the best mattress I've used. Not too firm yet not soft enough I wake up with a sore back. Also a really affordable price considering the value you're getting. Definitely getting this mattress again when it's time for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: My favorite mattress. 6’3” & 215lbs with history of back ...
customer_reviews.text: My favorite mattress. 6’3” & 215lbs with history of back issues. Can’t tolerate a mattress that isn’t solid. Back will be messed up within a couple days. This mattress is like a comfortable rock, but for me, that’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Wright

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical about buying a mattress over the internet by just going with the reviews, but, as a low back pain sufferer I can verify that this mattress is wonderful! So wonderful that I went ahead and bought the king version and will use this one for my son's bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Julian V

customer_reviews.title: This was moments after it was unwrapped.
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this for a month but so far so good!! So comfy!! It's firm but I sleep better with firm mattresses.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B.

customer_reviews.title: Does not fully decompress. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Like others who reviewed before me, this bed never decompressed. I called Amazon for the refund and they immediately complied, which was great. However, they stated I could keep or donate it. Because it was not decompressed, it was not worthy of keeping or even donating. In general, places don’t even accept mattresses for donation. So, basically Amazon pushed the responsibility of disposal back on me. Luckily, Ikea took it away when I had a mattress delivered from them. Note in the pictures that I did not remove the plastic because I had a feeling from the reviews would be correct about the defective decompression. The plastic is loose with holes in it and did not impact the decompression.
customer_reviews.author: iridescentfire

customer_reviews.title: wears out fast
customer_reviews.text: It was great at first. I have had it for almost 4 years and I wake up every day in pain, I feel like the memory foam is no longer supportive. you cant flip just turn the mattress. this has been progressively getting worse over the last year. It has indents that don't spring back.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Boucher

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: We already own a king size 13 inch Brentwood mattress and when we need a queen we didn't hesitate to order another Brentwood Home mattress. This one is just as great. both mattresses are on Zinus frames and even with heavy adults both the mattresses and frames have held up well with constant use and we sit on our beds a lot, the mattress springs right back. The gel is great even for hot sleepers like me the bed still stays cool, unlike the last foam mattress I owned. This is firm and supportive but also soft and comfortable. If I am away from home I can't wait to get back to my bed!!!! I would highly recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Lori BelmontTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Too Hard
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I found this mattress to be too hard for me. My experience was not in agreement with those who characterized it as... feeling like you're sleeping on a cloud. Although it does conforms to the shape of your body, if you have fibromyalgia and are in significant pain as I am at times, it might be best to consider a mattress where you can choose a specific narrowed feel such as a "plush" that will also address the issue of severe pressure point pain. I love that it is made in the USA. I found this company to be professional and reasonable and I was very happy with both their and Amazon's customer service.
customer_reviews.author: musiclady

customer_reviews.title: I love this mattress - A++
customer_reviews.text: The Brentwood Home Cypress Cooling Gel Memory Foam Mattress is everything I read in my research and better!!!! I have been sleeping on this mattress for 7 nights now, and the support of this medium-firm mattress is so healing and comforting, the temperature of the mattress responds to where I lay in it and feels like it is regulating a very comfortable sleep temperature..The was not even the slightest hint of any off-gassing when I opened the box it was in; very environmentally sustainable materials with non-toxic chemicals..clean and dreamy sleeping..I strongly recommend this Brentwood mattress!!!!
customer_reviews.author: C. S. Bostick

customer_reviews.title: Brentwood Does Not Honor Their Warranty if you buy from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: The mattress did not suit our needs. It was much softer than we can handle. It is strange because we purchased a different Brentwood mattress last year that was touted as only medium firmness. This one is medium-firm firmnessa nd is softer. Be aware that Brentwood does not honor their own warranty (including their touted 1 year Sleep Trial) if you buy from Amazon. Thank goodness for Amazon being a wonderful company. They took care of my needs and I really appreciate their great customer service! Brentwood, not so much.
customer_reviews.author: GoodVibrations

customer_reviews.title: Best mattresses!
customer_reviews.text: These beds are amazing!!! I bought a kind size for me and my husband and twin sizes for the two kids! I did mattress shopping in some big brand mattress stores and just couldn’t handle the $1000 plus sticker prices!! I can assure you these beds are not cheaply made. There is no strong chemical smell. We all love them and sleep great!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Uscanga

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Last!
customer_reviews.text: This review is 2.5 yrs after purchase. Do not buy this mattress if you are looking for it to last! It is sagging and buckling in thr middle, even with every month rotating. I bought mypillow mattress topper to try and help, but I am still waking up in pain from this mattress! If you want the 25 yr warranty, buy direct. But in my opinion, do not waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: R. Forbes

customer_reviews.title: Indentation "normal"?
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mattress for 5 years now. As I'm getting ready to replace it, I decided to write a review. After using this mattress for few months, it had a permanent indentation. When I called customer service, the response I got was, "that's normal" and it's not something they would cover under warranty because it's designed to be indented. This does not make sense to me as it does not give proper support. I did not have this issue with Tempurpedic bed, which I had for 10 years prior to purchasing this one. After 5 years of use, I think I've had it with this thing. I can't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Johnsam

customer_reviews.title: We like it better than a $6000 sleep number bed
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. We had purchased a $6000 sleep number bed during a 50% off sale. I wasn't very impressed with it so I purchased this bed as a comparison and because of all the great reviews. My wife and I both feel that this bed is much more comfortable than the sleep number bed, so we returned the sleep number and kept this bed. We're going to save a lot of money! Thanks Brentwood Home!
customer_reviews.author: Hans

customer_reviews.title: One end didn't expand completely
customer_reviews.text: One end didn't completely expand to its 13" height. I noticed when I removed it from the box and unfolded, that that end looked to be more compressed than the rest of the mattress. It's been over a week and it still the same. I've had to put wedges under that area so that the mattress is even and not sloping downward. I also noticed that one side is firmer than the other. Probably due to the expansion issue. Also, this mattress is very heavy. If there was an easy way to return and get a replacement I'd do that.
customer_reviews.author: SAM

customer_reviews.title: Works great for some people
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I were way overdue for a new mattress. We purchased this in a queen size and it has had its pros and cons. PROS: - Not incredibly expensive - The removable bamboo cover is nice for cleaning - Quiet and comfortable for most situations CONS: - This mattress was NOT comfortable when I was pregnant. It infuriated me to get in and out of the bed at night, especially when I was full-term, because I felt like a turtle who couldn't get off its back! It was awful. I did not have this problem on our other spring mattresses in the home. Now that I'm no longer pregnant, I haven't had this problem.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Great for Side Sleepers
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this mattress. Slept on it the day I received it. I am a side sleeper and have always had trouble with my back sinking in sideways as I am female, hips you know. With this mattress I am not constantly waking and repositioning. I will come back in a couple months to re-review. 7/14/2019-- IM BACK! So its 2 days shy of my purchase of this mattress. Im not impressed. The bed looks level when no one is in it but it sinks when there is, thats just 1 person.. If there are 2 people in it it is the worst! Ihave to say it does stay cool while sleeping but if it torks your back, ughhh.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: THIS DOES NOT LAST
customer_reviews.text: This bed was a good bed for just over a year. Since then, it has degraded in the middle where I sleep. It provides no support, and my back now hurts. If another person does share the bed with me, we both roll to the middle. I reached out to the company regarding the warranty, and the requirements they have ensure that any of us complaining about this issue cannot claim anything. They want visual confirmation of a sinking of 2" or more. My mattress doesn't look like it is faulty from the outside, but you can tell when you lie down. Do not spend your money on this. It is a waste.
customer_reviews.author: "mokey1313"

customer_reviews.title: This is a "medium firm" mattress NOT soft.
customer_reviews.text: I will first say this...it pays NOT to lean completely on the opinions of others. After reading some of the reviews I was very skeptical about the product. I'm an "abled" vet and have chronic back pain and was in desperate need of a new mattress. I'll get straight to the point...this mattress is, for the price, a five star mattress. Just two days in and my back is already being relieved. I've had my first pain-free night in months, I'm vet pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied! Sleeps like you are floating in a cloud.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress for my 13 year old son, who has grown several inches since we got it and it still is perfect for him. He has very his long legs and arms and sleeps all over the place. I have even tried out the mattress for myself and you literally feel like you are floating on a cloud. My daughter is so jealous because she had just purchased a different brand of foam mattress and it’s nowhere as comfortable as her little brothers Brentwood Home Cypress mattress! We will be buying another one soon. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Dorcia White-Brake

customer_reviews.title: I really didn't want to like this mattress.
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this for our 2nd home, we have a Sleep# at home that I like a lot and I figured we'd just get another so I was a bit surprised when she announced she had gotten a great deal on this thing. Our previous bed was some foam knock-off that turned out to be a real piece of garbage so I was expecting this to be another failure. I got a 5-Star snooze last night but am only rating it 4-Stars because it hasn't yet stood the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: Tom or Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Over time, developed a "valley"
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mattress for 3.5 years, and still "like" it, but definitely don't love it. I was affordable (more so when I bought it) and worked fine. I weigh about 220 pounds and, after a while, it developed a valley where I normally sleep. The mattress restores itself when I'm not in it, but quickly depresses when I go back to bed. When I sleep alone, I can compensate for it by sleeping somewhat diagonally, and I'm also used to it -- it's still a comfortable bed. But when I'm not alone in the bed, the valley is much more noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Kleinman

customer_reviews.title: Decent value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mattress and would give it 5 stars, but it gets too hot. Sometimes I wake up sweating, which then may make my very cold. Sometimes wearing clothes will keep me from getting sweaty. It's a bit of a temperature battle, but most of the types of mattresses have heat issues. Aside from the heat it's comfortable and I've gotten compliments on the comfort. You really do need to rotate it often as directed or it will sag. Rotating a mattress isn't something everyone can do easily, and the recommended frequency of rotation is cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: Gnome3.14

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional quality all around
customer_reviews.text: The feel is exactly the way it should be -- not too soft but not too firm either --. The quality is truly exceptional. As a PhD in engineering, I can attest that there is a lot of know-how and serious engineering that goes into making a product like this. It comes packaged about a third of its actual size, and all smooshed. Once you remove its constraints (rapping) it miraculously take perfect geometric shape and size and it stays that way. That's serious engineering. Excellent work. Brentwood Home makes it really easy for us to buy American!
customer_reviews.author: Michael M

customer_reviews.title: Things to consider before purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Read the warranty and consider your capabilities. After 5 years I find that this mattress no longer provides the support I need to control my hip pain. I'm not able to move the mattress and I'm unable to afford the return shipping. And perhaps the manufacturer told me there was no covered fault in the mattress? I didn't consider the possibility of having to return it should there be a problem. I really found this to be a great mattress for four to five years so if you are counting on the 25 year warranty, think about how you would return it if it became necessary.
customer_reviews.author: amzn enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Not FIRM
customer_reviews.text: Had such high hopes for this. This mattress COULD be great, for one person. This mattress is somewhat supportive, but is VERY soft. Which makes it cozy, but after a week, all sorts of back aches. Not to mention, two people in the bed end up rolling into each other as your body weight combined creates a dip in the middle. My husband fell out of bed one night because the mattress sagged so much when he went to the edge to get up. At the end, we contacted Amazon for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: megrat7

customer_reviews.title: too firm! but a good mattress for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Queen 13" Brentwood memory foam mattress....it is the greatest sleep in the World! as good as a Temperpedic.So for my guestroom,I bought an 11" EXACT same mattress but 2" less...it is made the same way...everything is the same EXCEPT the comfort.my new bed is too firm.The 13" one is just perfect and molds to my body...SMH>how they could be so different. And you really need deep pocket sheets for them! OK I just read most of the reviews and found that there is no "soft/firm" to any of these.Even tho the 11" and 13" are exactly the same,such a difference.It is still a great (online) buy.
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe

customer_reviews.title: A great firm mattress for back pain
customer_reviews.text: We replaced our TempurPedic with this mattress because my husband had bad back pain. This mattress has been awesome - no more back pain! It doesn’t sleep hot, and after six months I haven’t notices any sagging or lumps. Be sure to let it expand fully before you put weight on it, and you shouldn’t have any issues. Another shout out - this mattress has NO discernible offgassing! I’m a lung cancer patient in remission, so I am picky about indoor air quality. This mattress earns full stars for that alone.
customer_reviews.author: Mololock

customer_reviews.title: Starts off fine, but is too soft after 4 years.
customer_reviews.text: First, I want to say that I've had this mattress for 4 years, so my review is based on long term ownership. Overtime, its become extremely soft where we sleep, but the center is still rather firm. The effect creates a divide in the bed. Its even difficult to sit on the edge because its so soft, you feel as though you'll slip off. I do not recommend this mattress to anyone looking for value over the long term. It's good for a few years, but don't expect much more than that.
customer_reviews.author: AnotherAmazonJunkie

customer_reviews.title: Bought this mattress a few years ago and loved it. It is soft at the top but ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mattress a few years ago and loved it. It is soft at the top but still firm enough to give a good amount of support when sleeping. Sitting on the edge of the bed will make it slouch a decent amount (I am 200 lbs), but I never had issues with damage to the mattress from this. It does take a bit of time to break in, but otherwise a fantastic mattress. We recently moved and I purchased this bed again as soon as I arrived.
customer_reviews.author: A. C.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this matress in size king for almost 5yrs and been through 2 pregnancies. Love it because its so comfortablely firm yet soft. And doesnt make sounds nor can you feel when spouse turns in bed. We have rotated the bed around when bed feels less firm the past years mainly squeezing out the last drops from this mattress before we buy a new one pretty soon. For 5yrs and 2 pregnancies its held up well. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: We have the mattress for about 4 months now. My son who weighs about 60 pounds sleep on it and he loves it. I have lain on it for maybe 1 hour at the most on it and really like the firmness, but I have never used it for a whole night. The one thing I don’t like is the edge support, it isn’t very good, compared to my memory foam mattress, but my mattress was also double the price. I think it’s a very good mattress for it’s value. I gave it 4stars because of the edge support. It also had a smell for a couple of weeks, but it’s gone now.
customer_reviews.author: AustrianSeamstress

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed. Received mattress
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed. Received mattress, opened and discovered large wet spot that smelled of chemicals. Cannot return as no way to package/send once expanded.
customer_reviews.author: readin' it

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my camper
customer_reviews.text: I did tons and tons of research looking for a replacement mattress for my camper which is at a permanent campground at the beach. A neighbor shared this company/mattress. I went with the 13" high Queen 60x80 one. If you are purchasing for a camper/RV depending on the amount of space you have it could be a tight fit especially if your bedroom has a slant towards the front of the camper. The mattress doesn't fit snug again that slant. I don't care. I am so happy with the comfort. I can't believe I waited this long to place my order. HIGHLY recommended. I LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! read more...
customer_reviews.text: Best mattress I have EVER owned! It is very well made, and just as described. I left it out to off-gas and fully expand for about 4 days but there was not much off-gassing anyway, besides, it's completely non-toxic so the only thing left is to see how well it holds up over time, but I think this is a very good product and company.
customer_reviews.author: M C

customer_reviews.title: A comfy sleep
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is a good compromise between firm and soft. Supports the body well but does not feel hard or make you sink into a hole. The coolness factor was my only issue. It is not as good at dissapating heat as I had hoped but it is better than some other memory foam mattresses I have slept on. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Abvarn

customer_reviews.title: Best natural non toxic mattress for the money
customer_reviews.text: Little to no off gassing. Supportive and comfortable, certifications that assure there are no toxic material and your sleeping on a safe base. What is there not to like. I like this mattress so much I bought 3, though I bought the 13” directly from Brentwood, they were helpful and gave me 10% off. Also I prefer their return policy just in case, but I’m keeping, fantastic mattress.
customer_reviews.author: K.H.

customer_reviews.title: Waaay too firm
customer_reviews.text: Maybe the mattress-in-a-box just isn’t for us?? After two recommendations from friends, we tried this mattress—gave it the full amount of time, but by the second month, our backs were hurting. It is super firm, not “medium”. And it was so hot my husband would wake up in pools of sweat. Both of us started getting nightmares, we think from the mix of heat, pain, and insomnia. Thank you Amazon for your gracious return policy. We are now shopping for a “real” mattress. In the meantime, we had to get a $200 4” memory foam/pillow top topper on this just to get us through the night.
customer_reviews.author: Amyae

customer_reviews.title: Smells of toxicity
customer_reviews.text: The mattress smelled like chemicals, a problem when you think you are buying a so called “non toxic” matress
customer_reviews.author: Michael Blanton

customer_reviews.title: Do not expect the bed to hold up for a year let alone 25
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY UNLESS YOU WANT TO REPLACE YOUR MATTRESS EVERY YEAR. After just over one year of use my properly supported bed that holds one 200lb person is saging. When I contacted the company I was given 7 PAGE FORM to fill out. Page after page of exacting detail of the MANY pictures and measurements I would need to take. Time to file an Amazon claim and see if they can help me. DO NOT BUY IF YOU DO NOT WANT TO REPLACE YOUR MATTRESS EVERY YEAR.
customer_reviews.author: ElPolloDiablo

customer_reviews.title: Not a really nice sleep
customer_reviews.text: You will need to move yourself about 10" to the inside away from edges or you will get submerged. This mattress foam does not have efficient design and reinforcement along edges.
customer_reviews.author: DIAZ LIFE

customer_reviews.title: decent but not incredible
customer_reviews.text: i guess i am happy overall, but don't feal like i am floating or anything magical. i wake up rested and don't feel any pressure points which was main concern. still preferable vs. price and comfort of traditional mattresses. was very difficult (heavy and awkward) to get upstairs, literally throwing my back out haha. also annoying that the sides have no firmness (didn't realize how often i like to sit on the edge of a bed...) I
customer_reviews.author: me me me

customer_reviews.title: Be very careful of ordering large items: returns can be difficult, expensive, if not impossible.
customer_reviews.text: Big mistake! I wake up sweating with nothing for cover but a single sheet. After laying in one spot for a while it does conform to my body but takes a little while to conform to a new position. I know it would be impossible to return a large item such as a mattress so I am stuck with it. As a senior citizen I should have known better, but in the future I will make d-mn sure of my options for return, if I ever order anything on line again! These type of mattress are probably fine for some people, but not for me. Thanks for a venue to express my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: First time buying a mattress online and must say it is better then the store bought ones in getting the job done. It’s comfy and soft , the only thing is it’s stitching is coming undone in some areas when I first opened it I noticed . Hopefully it’s no biggie.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: The problem is that the mattress never fully recovered from ...
customer_reviews.text: The problem is that the mattress never fully recovered from the packaging. The mattress is bowed in the middle and falls off on the sides making it extremely uncomfortable. The mattress is also much smaller than a full size. I have a full size bed frame and there are several inches on both sides and length wise. Extremely disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Macs Mom

customer_reviews.title: it's lasted
customer_reviews.text: purchased sept. 2015 .I needed a bed to help with an intense labor job which ended up being a good decision. its still in the master bedroom to this day and would probably last a lot longer. I am looking into getting a king now but,with all the competition and the uncertainty of online purchases (especially a bed) we are probably going to have to shop local. I would definitely buy this again if the price point was on par with its competition.
customer_reviews.author: EM1189

customer_reviews.title: Not the same mattress as the last 2 I purchased from this company
customer_reviews.text: This is my third mattress from this company. This one is nothing like the first 2. This is extremely soft, not even close to medium. It is also shaped like a bubble with the corners and edges tapering off. There is no support within a few feet of the edges and it literally collapses and you will fall right of the bed. They no longer have a website and their customer service number is now a voicemail that says e-mail them, but you do not get a response.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Gardner

customer_reviews.title: IMPORTANT don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in July so we used it for just shy of 6 months. The mattress was fine and comfortable for a while until it developed memory and now we cannot sleep on it without back pain. I now sleep on the floor and the company won’t do anything about this issue because we didn’t purchase it from them directly. Stay away and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Heather K.

customer_reviews.title: Fumes to strong!
customer_reviews.text: The fumes were so strong my daughter was unable to even try the mattress. Her face turned red and went numb. Tried to let it air out, it didn't work. She thinks it might have been the adhesive used to hold the different the different foam parts together.
customer_reviews.author: K. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I woke up in the sky...
customer_reviews.text: Or so I thought... Because it's like I'm sleeping on clouds. This is the third foam mattress I've had. Lost the first one in my divorce. Probably the worst part of my divorce. But in hindsight, maybe not, because this mattress, at half the price, is even better than that one. My other foam mattress was a queen size. I liked it, but not as much as this one. It's important to note, I do NOT like super-firm mattresses. I like somewhat soft mattresses. I'd consider this a "medium firm" mattress, and it works fantastically.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Returned it because it did not inflate all the way. We waited 4 days until we decided to return it. Amazon customer service was awesome and didn’t give me any problems on the return. One other thing we noticed was it has a horrible chemical smell that after a week of it now being open with a opened window, the smell is still present. That concerned me. Will not be buying it again. We are going with a different brand of mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Hard and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Have slept on this one night - very uncomfortable. I ordered a Queen but was shipped a King. Amazon took care of it right away. I am using it on an adjustable bed - when I put the bed in zero gravity position, which is very comfortable with other mattresses, I start to feel pressure spots on my backside quickly. I wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: cs

customer_reviews.title: The odor / smell is too much
customer_reviews.text: Received mattress today, unboxing was easy. The box with mattress was heavy but manageable for me to take upstairs without assistance. It only took a few hours for it to grow to max size. My issue with the mattress is the very STRONG smell. The tag states it was manufactured 7/2019, so it’s likely the mattress has been wrapped in plastic for 5 months. I will give it a few days to off gas and will report back. If you’re sensitive to smells, I suggest you avoid mattresses in a box. Photo taken immediately after unboxing.
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE TAYLOR

customer_reviews.title: This mattress appears to be of excellent build quality and arrived without any damage
customer_reviews.text: This mattress appears to be of excellent build quality and arrived without any damage. I especially liked that there was no bad smell which can't be said of many/most other manufactures. My wife and I both like a mattress that is firm, yet yielding. This was not that mattress. For us, the mattress is too soft. For instance, if we lay on our backs (not our normal position) the bed is fine but we both sink deeply in to the mattress. My wife is only 115 lbs so our weight is not the problem. If I lay on my side, my hip and should will hurt in the morning. I would classify this mattress as medium to medium-soft firmness.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Baxley

customer_reviews.title: Great bed for half the cost of standard equal quality
customer_reviews.text: This matress is as good as my Sealy crown jewel was but for more than half the cost,it does not sleep hot or feel weird or indifferent compared to conventional matress & boxspring! I bought the 11" memory cool gel and laid it right on top of my old box springs which as far as I can tell are still good,it was a very simple process,delivered in a round vaccum sealed bundle that I was able to carry myself & open & set up,just need be careful when opening packaging,not to slice thru to matress cover,it's easy to rotate & would purchase it again,the bed is very comfortable & very quiet & stable when partner moves or turns
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Comfort will surprise you
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for 3 months now. It has exceeded all of my expectations. Super comfortable and supportive. I did lots of research prior to making the purchase, but face it. It's somewhat of a crap shoot when buying something like a mattress online. But this was exactly as described. Easy set up. No odor. And at least for the first three months...a perfect sleep experience. Be aware that the 13 in. depth will require deep pocket sheets. All in all, one of the best purchases I have made online. I wholeheartedly endorse this product.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara L

customer_reviews.title: ... size mattress three years ago due to the overwhelming good reviews on amazon
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the 11" king size mattress three years ago due to the overwhelming good reviews on amazon. The mattress was good for 2.5 years and after that a permanent pit formed on my side of the mattresses from my body imprint. I am not particularly heavy but the hollow imprint does not go away. Even my wife now has back pain and we think it is caused by the mattress. This should not happen after a little over two years of use to an otherwise high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Karsten Bahlmann

customer_reviews.title: 3 years satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this mattress about three years ago and haven’t looked back. This thing is wonderful. We bought a King and have enjoyed great sleep since the first night we got it. I have recommended this to anyone I hear talking about buying a new mattress. The memory foam is incredible and after three years it hasn’t seemed to sink in anywhere or have any lasting divots. When it’s time to buy a new mattress in a couple years, we’ll probably just buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: SPH

customer_reviews.title: Longevity is horrid
customer_reviews.text: At first it was fine but then 13 months later it is just horrid. It is too soft, it bottoms out when I do not ever flop on it randomly, you sink it in so easily, new insomnia issues, and it created new back issues. I am pretty saavy with health here having 8 years of medicine under my belt in a variety of specialties to include neurology and orthopedics. I sleep like pure garbage on the mattress and this thing is HOT! I remember having a QVC mattress with the same cover but was a lot more resilient than this thing (unfortunately my cousins dog urinated on it). Right now this mattress is homeless but looking.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice Ragland

customer_reviews.title: Love at first night!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my waterbed - yes, I've been sleeping on waterbeds for over 30 years. Hard to believe, I know. I was nervous at first because I have back and hip problems, and pressure points that kill me. I even take a blow up mattress with me on trips because I can't sleep on most hotel beds. But this bed was love at first night! No waking up with pain in my back, hips, neck or other places. I sleep like a baby. And it isn't hot. This is the best investment in me that I've made in years. Great Product and Great Value! I could not be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Betty Spivey

customer_reviews.title: 10 out of 10!
customer_reviews.text: We bought 4 of these in the king size for our new cabin and love them. Our guests compliment our mattresses every time and use words like "I feel like I'm at a luxury hotel" and "you must have paid a lot for that mattress because it's way better than mine at home". And two of our friends own the $3000 name brand bed set and said they prefer our Brentwood. You won't believe how comfortable this mattress is.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to love this mattress and was so excited for it to ...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this mattress and was so excited for it to come home. Unfortunately the mattress did not live up to the reviews. I am extremely disappointed with this purchase. I expected the bed to provide support since it is on the more firm side of memory foam mattresses. However, it sags without giving support. It is also uncomfortable. So the worst two combinations a bed can have, it is not comfortable and doesn't give support. Just as a reference I am pretty petite (5'2 and 100 lb.). Even then, I sink into this hard mattress.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Would rate higher but came out of box with a seam split open. Contacted manufacturer and they told me I had to deal with Amazon and ship back. If you have ever seen one of these expand, shipping back would be like stuffing the genie back in the bottle. Disappointed with quality, but sewed seam up and will hope for no reoccurrence. My daughter loves it and seems very comfortable. Price reasonable for comparable products. Can't comment on long term durability as only first week.
customer_reviews.author: Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a queen to replace the RV queen in our new travel trailer. Very happy with it thus far (2 weekends worth). I was a little nervous based on some reviews claiming it to be soft and that you sink right though. I believe these people must be reviewing the wrong product! This mattress is definitely on the med firm/firm side as advertised, and at 240lbs I'm no where near sinking through this mattress. We used a 2" memory foam topper in our last trailer, and it slept very hot. With this, I've slept great, not once waking up in the middle of the night to change the number of layers on the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Rice

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress and excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using this mattress since July 2015 and this is the best mattress I have ever slept on. Excellent support whether I sleep on my side or back and it melts to hug the curves of your body. Its also the perfect balance of softness and firmness for me. Even my partner loves this bed. I still love this bed 4 years later.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: This arrived quickly and in good condition, it comes rolled tightly in a large ...
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my daughter, her mattress was ageing and in need of replacement. This arrived quickly and in good condition, it comes rolled tightly in a large box however inflation of the mattress was quick and there was no odor. This is a really nice mattress, well constructed and the cover on it is really nice quality. No worries of bad chemicals with this one. This is a bit firm but that is what she likes and the reason we purchased this particular model (bamboo gel 11). I would recommend if you want a firmer mattress that is good quality and doesn't break the bank. She has had this for a few months and it's still great.
customer_reviews.author: Dea

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but a BIG change from a conventional mattress
customer_reviews.text: I really like this but I think my wife is less enamored of it. I was waking with bad backaches so thought I'd give this a try. I wake much less stiff now, but it comes at a price. If you sit on the edge of the bed you do sink down a bit (I'm heavier than the average bear, though) and other activities are a bit more awkward (without going into details). But for sleeping I really enjoy the memory foam and with the gel infusion I think it stays cooler than pure memory foam.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C

customer_reviews.title: If you need me, I'll be in bed
customer_reviews.text: Best bed ever! My biggest need was to find a bed that kept me and my husband cool at night (because waking up with sweat drenched clothes is the absolute worst) and this bed delivered! It's not too firm or too soft and it definitely doesn't feel like I'm sinking into a memory foam nightmare. It's the perfect balance of all things wonderful. As a 130lbs woman it supports and gives without feeling like I'm sleeping on a rock while perfectly supporting my 250lbs husband. I don't know how, but it's like the one size fits all bed. If you are searching for a new bed just stop and buy this thing. You'll love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Ritschel

customer_reviews.title: Brentwood Home Cypress Mattress very comfy
customer_reviews.text: There was no unpleasant smell like some people complained about with other mattresses. It began to puff up right away, but most important - I finally got a good nights sleep and didn't wake up with sore hips and shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Jes

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and consistently inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this mattress, unfolded it, left it on the box spring for two days and it didn’t inflate. It was completely lumpy and rose about 2” on one side and nothing on the other. I called amazon to exchange for another one, however, when I received the second one today, it did the EXACT same thing. I’m extremely disappointed. Now I have to return both, and I’m without a bed. 😤😤😤
customer_reviews.author: lindsay Nagel

customer_reviews.title: Way firmer than you think!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be made very well, and perhaps is great if you only lie/sleep on your back. But is way firmer than I think anyone would expect for 13" of foam! My shoulders and hips are killing me in the morning! My wife wants us to keep using it hoping it will "break in", I think it's me who will break first. May have to sleep on the couch until I can afford to replace it. Really bummed
customer_reviews.author: cheri svendson

customer_reviews.title: Zzzzzzzzzz
customer_reviews.text: Great price, arrived quick and performs as advertised. I've had this mattress for almost a year and it's still going strong. I like a firm mattress but oddly enough it's firm but soft at the same time and I love it ... I know that makes no sense. I make sure to rotate, not flip, the mattress on each sheet change only because I sit on it to watch tv, and don't want to create a hole ... I think I'm just being cautious due to how other mattresses have performed in the past. No issues, mattress is great.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Charles

customer_reviews.title: Husband and I absolutely love this bed
customer_reviews.text: Husband and I absolutely love this bed! It is firm yet comfortable. Inflating very fast, and more importantly it does not smell. We had a softer expensive memory foam mattress, and it had been hurting my lower back and shoulder, I am feeling great after sleeping in this bed for a week now. We bought a dynasty king size mattress at the same time, it was a good mattress, but smell does not go away which is really a huge turn off. I wish we had bought another Brentwood King.
customer_reviews.author: doglover

customer_reviews.title: Best Mattress We Have Owned By Far.
customer_reviews.text: Soft and supportive at the same time. Comes in a long rectangular box with precut handholds to allow you to position it beside the bed prior to opening. It is recommended that you have the mattress on your bed frame before opening the plastic wrap and that you use two people to open the plastic wrapped mattress - once opened it begins to fill and expand immediately. We let the mattress expand overnight and detected only a very slight odor on the second day. We were able to use it on the second night. Caution - it may greatly expand your dream intensity and you may feel discouraged to rise out of it in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: SoCal Gal

customer_reviews.title: soooooooooo comfortable After a hard days work
customer_reviews.text: Wow... can't say enough about this item.... soooooooooo comfortable After a hard days work, shower and dinner I look forward to jumping in bed.... The kids love it too... it's king size so the whole family enjoys it while we watch some Netflix or amazon video. Goes great with my new king size pillows as well and it's similar quality. I highly recommend buying this item... the whole family will love you for it. ****** If you enjoyed my review please vote this review as helpful and feel free to ask me any additional questions and I'll answer them to the best of my abilities ******
customer_reviews.author: JFamily

customer_reviews.title: 5yr update
customer_reviews.text: Weve had this mattress 5yrs now. Still as comfortable as day 1. We turn it every few months to avoid imprints. Great mattress, no tears, no holes, it's still in perfect condition. We have 2 waterproof mattress pads as we have 2xl dogs (saint & mastiff) who jump up there as soon as we get up.
customer_reviews.author: Ange

customer_reviews.title: Luckily everything worked out great and the mattress is quite nice and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: When buying a mattress, Amazon isn't really the first place you think of to buy one. Luckily everything worked out great and the mattress is quite nice and very comfortable. I sleep on my tummy and use no pillows. I would say this a firm mattress is firm, with support. The mattress does have a smell to it, even days after you open it. The smell isn't bad, but it's there for someone like me with a sensitive nose. It reached full size in minutes and only changed very little after a few days to reach 11". Overall I'm happy with it, I just hope it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Miltz

customer_reviews.title: Very Firm
customer_reviews.text: It's been 2 months and in the back of my mind, I wish I would have went with the supposedly softer 13" version. This 11" is very firm. I'm only 145lbs and my wife is around 130, so that might have something to do with it. We ended up using a 2" memory foam topper from our old mattress and it made a big difference to where I don't wake up with a sore back anymore. The mattress itself is well constructed and the bamboo cover is really nice. I just wish it was less firm.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Gallagan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful! EDIT  have had this mattress for just under 3 years and there is significant sagging and it is very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: After having 2 traditional mattresses fail on us in the last few years and costing us a few thousand dollars, we decided to try a foam mattress. We've been sleeping on this mattress for over 6 months now and we LOVE IT!! No breakdown, no dips or sagging, no heat retention. My spouse and I are both larger people and I have been so impressed by the quality of this bed. When it's time to buy a new mattress, we will be purchasing another one of these. The price can't be beat and the quality is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: EM-labtech9

customer_reviews.title: Same problems, different mattress
customer_reviews.text: Initially, the bed was a huge relief, and my husbands movement wasn't as noticeable as with a traditional mattress. However after a year of sleeping on it, the hip and low back pain has returned, and there is a definite ridge in the center of the mattress. It is still nice to sink into, but I'll be upgrading. Again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah O.

customer_reviews.title: A good nights sleep
customer_reviews.text: I really love this mattress because it conforms to your body and then completely resets itself to its original form. This mattress does not have edge support and due to its design does not bounce. It does not get hot at night and that's saying a lot since we live in Houston. It has been great for my back and sciatica. I gave it only 4 stars because it's not a firm enough mattress for anyone who weighs more than 225 or so. My husband, due to his weight, feels that it sinks just a bit too much. However, we both feel this mattress is an exceptional deal for the price and everything that it offers.
customer_reviews.author: Read, Travel, Love

customer_reviews.title: Good bed with update
customer_reviews.text: Only cause I had to write something to rate it 🙄 Update: I’ve had this bed for about 5 months and I absolutely love it! It’s so comfortable and I fall asleep quickly. Granted I am short enough I could turn it sideways, which I did😂 I wanted a bed I could roll on and I have space since my furry children sleep with my boyfriend and me. I highly recommend this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Liz B.

customer_reviews.title: Disfigured Disappointment!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this laying out to expand fully for 8 days. It will not finish and looks like a boat with the two ends refusing to expand. The head and foot ends are very hard on the bottom where is not filling out. I can't even lay on it to see if it is comfortable since it is so disfigured. Completely unusable! So disappointed. I was really hoping I would like this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnae H

customer_reviews.title: This mattress is awesome. I still go to bed every night saying ...
customer_reviews.text: I have waited a few months before writing a review because anyone who has purchased a new mattress knows that you don't really know until you have slept on one night after night. This mattress is awesome. I still go to bed every night saying "I LOVE MY BED" After pricing several different memory foam beds this one is FANTASTIC for the price. Easy to transport (we have narrow steps). Easy to assemble (open the bag). You will not regret buying this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: We loved this bad for the first few months but now 6+ Months have gone by and we could not care less about this bed. For the price you get what you were paying for but I wouldn’t recommend this just to anyone. I do but think Brentwood Makes very good products and they have great higherend mattresses that I would recommend over this cheaper version.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Love the bed
customer_reviews.text: Love the bed. It's affordable, cushy but not too cushy and not too firm. Comes packaged in a box and unfurls easily. I got the 13" as I needed a little more cushin for the... and my "friend" got the 11" - it's more of a firm mattress than the 13". If you like firm, go with the 11 or if you like cushy, go with the 13. I've recommended this mattress to a few friends and they love it. .
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable mattress! We've had this for around nine months ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable mattress! We've had this for around nine months now and it is nice. Never had an issue. Most comfortable mattress we've had. It's one of those things where you know when it's wrong and don't think about it when it's right. I never even think about it. Just pleasant sleep. My partner and I have different back issues and this was the trick. It takes a day or so to expand fully. And there was very little smell which was an issue we were wondering about. Both very sensitive to chemicals. I would recommend this one. Very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Krehbiel

customer_reviews.title: Great sleep for sore muscles
customer_reviews.text: I have had mine for 3 years now and I'm still happy with it. This mattress is the perfect firmness and I don't wake up more sore like I was with a less supportive mattress. I keep it just on the floor, and it's thick enough that it's still easy to get in and out of (even after a marathon). I've had guest ask me where I got it. I was getting overheated at first, but it was because I had placed a waterproof cover on it. It breaths really well since I've removed it.
customer_reviews.author: chiropterarachel

customer_reviews.title: Good for a year.
customer_reviews.text: We have had this mattress for three years now and are looking to replace. The edges were soft from day one. If you sit on the edge of the bed, you sink to the frame. The sleeping area was great for the first year. Now there are indentions in the mattress where we sleep. My wife is 100 pounds and I am 180 pounds and you sleep in a valley. The mattress started wearing out within the second year. We now wake with back and shoulder pain that was never there before. So all and all it was great for year one, uncomfortable for year two and being replaced after year three.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Not the dream bed I had hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: I had searched for months for a non toxic made in America mattress. As part of the Black Friday deals I thought I had found the perfect choice. The mattress never inflated in the four corners and the middle is way higher than the rest of the bed. Thank goodness for Amazons refund policy. I guess you get what you pay for. I’ll be ordering another bed after the holidays. Only draw back is I have to now find a way to get rid of this heavy king sized mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C. Searle

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: Those who give this a bad rating just didn't read the instructions correctly and honestly blame the company..sigh. This happens too often. This is beautiful.we follow the instructions and rotate the mattress. We love it. Its sage product and affordable. I work out and am always sore but once I lay down I feel in heaven. Knowing my children are not breathing in chemicals while laying in my bed make me feel even better. This mattress needs a good platform frame.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Gracey

customer_reviews.title: Reduces body pain
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the twin size in the standards firmness. This is a great mattress. My back and body pain has noticeably decreased over the last 2 weeks. The biggest difference came on the third morning. Now when I wake up, I don't hurt. It is nice to have at least an hour each morning when I don't hurt and without having to take medication. I can't depend on the medication to always work, but at least I can depend on the mattress to give me relife. Somedays, when I get home after work, I lay down for just 15 minutes to get some extra relief. I'd definitely recommend buying one. I will almost certainly buy another.
customer_reviews.author: J.D.M.M.

customer_reviews.title: This is a very very comfortable bed. I never could sleep on my back
customer_reviews.text: This is a very very comfortable bed.I never could sleep on my back,my right leg would go numb.I have bad arthritis,this bed conforms to your body.I can sleep on my back,side,stomach,without any discomfort at all.I should mention the mattress has to be rotated every 2 weeks for the first 3 montha.It is light weight and is accomplished without any problem.It beats the Stearns and Foster 4800.00 dollar bed that weighed a ton and for the last 10 yrs we couldn't rotate it at all.This bed will be the only bed I ever own in the future.
customer_reviews.author: bebe

product_meta.title: Brentwood Home Cypress Cooling Gel Memory Foam Mattress, Non-Toxic, Made in California, 13-Inch, Queen Size
product_meta.description: Size:Queen| Style:13-InchThis Brentwood Home Cypress Gel 13 mattress provides a medium feel. The 3.5-inch layer of gel infused memory foam responds to your body’s individual shape, weight, and temperature. It adjusts its shape to provide precise support, keeping your spine in alignment while relieving discomfort at pressure points in areas like your hips and shoulders. The infused gel and the ventilated airflow layer evenly disperse heat through the mattress to prevent hot spots that lead to tossing and turning. Our special blend of memory foam actively responds to your movements, allowing you to move freely around the bed without experiencing the quicksand effect. A solid support base absorbs your weight to dampen motion transfer and prevent noise. The mattress is finished in a removable wool-lined zipper cover that stretches in all directions, allowing you to enjoy maximum pressure relief. The wool lining resists odors while it wicks away moisture and regulates body temperature by creating microclimates. This means that you stay cool in the summer and warm in the winter. The safety of your family is important to us so we only use CertiPUR-US certified foams that are free of flame-retardants, formaldehyde, heavy metals, and phthalates. We offer a 25-year warranty as a guarantee of quality. You will be protected from manufacturing defects and premature sagging. We compress and roll our mattresses for easier shipping and setup. Please note that any Brentwood Home Mattress purchased through Amazon is subject to Amazon's 30-day return policy.
feature_bullets: COOLING MEMORY FOAM: 3.5-inches of gel memory foam conforms to your body for greater pressure relief and proper spinal alignment. Reduces tossing and turning and eliminates motion transfer.

NATURAL BAMBOO & ORGANIC WOOL: Our soft bamboo derived rayon stretch knit cover is lined with GOTS and OEKO-TEX Standard 100 certified organic wool to wick moisture, regulate temperature, and prevent odor. It's also removable so you can replace it when it's time for a refresh.
ECO-FRIENDLY: Fiberglass free. Greenguard Gold Certified nontoxic and low VOC. Made with CertiPUR-US foams free of flame retardants, heavy metals, formaldehyde, and phthalates.
MEDIUM FEEL: Perfectly balanced comfort is great for side, back, and stomach sleepers or partners with different preferences.
QUALITY GUARANTEED: Made in USA. 25 Year Limited Warranty. Mattress comes compressed and rolled in a box for easy shipping and setup.
